OverviewÂ¶

bhp_identifier is a module to handle identifier allocation for various subject types. An identifier is created as follows:
  • from ModelAdmin.save_model() or Model.save() call get_identifier() of a selected bhp_identifier class, e.g SubjectIdentifier.
  • identifier class combines the device_id from settings.py and a sequence number from model Sequence to create a unique identifier.
The models involved are:
  • models.subject_identifier.SubjectIdentifier
  • Sequence

Also, the settings attribute DEVICE_ID is required for each device that creates identifiers.

Warning

If more than one device creates identifiers ensure the DEVICE_ID for each device is unique and that the model Sequence is maintained on that device.
